attributes.action: make british history a core subject in british schools
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
we understand the prime minister is a very proud british man so why isnt he doing more to create a larger sence of national pride in the United Kingdom 
which has been disregarded by many people.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
